entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.8°C

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:11 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 08:11 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
